entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 900 metres. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
